snippet: It was the ladies who had Mick Jagger’s cocky strut and sex appeal at a performance of all 21 tracks from the Rolling Stones’ classic collected hits album, “Hot Rocks 1964-1971.”
abstract: It was the ladies who had Mick Jagger’s cocky strut and sex appeal at a performance of all 21 tracks from the Rolling Stones’ classic collected hits album, “Hot Rocks 1964-1971.”

headline.main: Women Give Rolling Stones Tribute What It Needs
